Participants.evidence: Six healthy swine (41.0 ± 3.1 kg) were sedated, mechanically ventilated

Intervention.evidence: connected to a prototype extracorporeal circuit for continuous renal replacement therapy featuring a citrate-removal stage

Objective.evidence: we developed an innovative RCA technique based on Ion Exchange Resin (i-ER) technology

Method_Outcome.evidence: Samples were collected at baseline, 2, 8, 15, 30, 45, 60, 90, and 120 min for citrate

Result_Outcome.evidence: R > 60 min, MA = 0 mm. Citrate concentrations in blood samples were stable within 30 min, then slowly increased.
